title: Dave Riggler's Stories
features: This is a collection of six short stories concerning David Riggler, a handicapped person who uses a wheelchair. Follow him through his early childhood to middle age as he comes to terms with himself and faces the challenges that come with not only his situation, but with the human condition in general.The stories in this volume are:Learning To CrawlFirst StepsLast CallGoing UnderTuesdayPennedHandicapped, wheelchair, disabled, spina bifida, fiction.
